Name: pubsub/all: disable prefetch based on queue level
blob/gcsblob: gcloud auth login does not set ADC
server: Add standardized error reporting
blob/gcsblob: Support unauthenticated credentials for public buckets
blob/fileblob: adopt O_TMPFILE, RESOLVE_BENEATH, FICLONE
runtimevar/etcdvar: etcd has all sorts of go.mod problems
all: Migrate to OpenTelemetry
blob/s3: allow to specify profile via query string
blob: add support for GCS via Firebase
pubsub/rabbit: Allow parameters
server/requestlog: request logging unconditionally consumes entire body
docstore: array contains query
blob/s3: High memory usage during multi-part uploads
blob: Add support for cross bucket copy
docstore/all: support provider-specific filters
blob: Provide an api for getting URl for public objects
docstore/gcpdatastore: Add support for Google Firestore in Datastore mode
blob/s3blob: fails to copy large file >5GB
blob: more "go-like" ListIterator
pubsub: Ordered queues instead of topics
blob: Add an API to compose objects
blob: add support for querying via SQL
all: cache/ cache/redis cache/memorystore cache/elasticache
docstore: support OR queries
docstore: Query.Update should retry on revision check failure
